page.title: 20CHURCH GROUPS IN BEXLEYHEATH
page.content:
Many of the churches in the area organise recreational groups in which residents can participate. They do not always appear to be restricted to followers of particular belief, but the majority of their members do attend that church.
In the case of St. Paulinus C. of E. church at Crayford, a good example of the type of activity provided is to be found. A typical range of activities follows:- CUBS & SCOUTS/ BROWNIES & GUIDES catering for boys and girls; DRAMA, MUSIC & SOCIAL GROUPS for all the parishioners; SENIOR CITIZEN'S GROUP for pensioners in the neighbourhood; MOTHER & TODDLER GROUP for pre-school children. Many of the churches have halls attached and these are used for community activities.
